info.title: Open Weather Map
info.description: Get weather and weather forecasts for multiple cities.
info.x-long-description: Get weather and weather forecasts for multiple cities.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: You can use different types of metric systems by units = metric or imperial

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Must be used with lat. Get current weather data when you know the longitude of the city.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: If left blank will default to JSON output. Ability to retrieve data in XML or HTML.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Must be used with lon. Get current weather data when you know the latitude of the city.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: To setup accuracy level please use type parameter that have two values - accurate and like. In case of accurate value you will get results that exactly equivalent to your searching word. In case of like value the result is searching by substring. type ['accurate', 'like']  Example

parameters.name: cnt
parameters.description: To limit number of listed cities please setup cnt parameter

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: use this parameter when searching for a city. Do not use with other parameters

get.description: By city name. Input the city name or its part and get the list of the most proper cities in the world. Example - Lon or Lond or London. The more precise city name you put the more precise list you will get. To make it more precise put the city's name or its part, comma, the name of the county or 2-letter country code. You will get all proper cities in chosen county. The order is important - the first is city name than comma than county. Example - Lon, UK or Lon, GB or London, GB or Lon, England. By geographic coordinates.

To get access to historical weather data for the **5 previous days**

lat, lon geographical coordinates (latitude, longitude)
dt date from the 5 previous days (unix time, UTC time zone), e.g. dt=1586468027

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: You can use lang parameter to get output in your language. We support the following languages that you can use with the corresponded lang values: English - en, Russian - ru, Italian - it, Spanish - sp, Ukrainian - ua, German - de, Portuguese - pt, Romanian - ro, Polish - pl, Finnish - fi, Dutch - nl, French - fr, Bulgarian - bg, Swedish - se, Chinese Traditional - zh_tw, Chinese Simplified - zh_cn, Turkish - tr

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Must be used with lon.  Get current weather data when you know the latitude of the city.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: If left blank will default to JSON output.  Ability to retrieve data in XML or HTML.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: To use JavaScrip code you can transfer callback functionName to JSONP callback.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: You can use different types of metric systems by units = metric or imperial

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Get current weather data when you know the city ID.  Not to be used with lon, lat, or q

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Must be used with lat.  Get current weather data when you know the longitude of the city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: use this parameter when searching for a city.  Do not use with other parameters

get.description: Using this kind of requests you can get weather data in any location on the earth. The current weather data are updated online based on data from more than 40,000 weather stations.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: mode - possible values are JSON xml. If mode parameter is empty the format is JSON by default.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: {zip code},{country code}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: city id

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: You can use different types of metric systems by units = metric or imperial

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Must be used with lat. Get current weather data when you know the longitude of the city.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Must be used with lon. Get current weather data when you know the latitude of the city.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: You can use lang parameter to get the output in your language. We support the following languages that you can use with the corresponded lang values: Arabic - ar, Bulgarian - bg, Catalan - ca, Czech - cz, German - de, Greek - el, English - en, Persian (Farsi) - fa, Finnish - fi, French - fr, Galician - gl, Croatian - hr, Hungarian - hu, Italian - it, Japanese - ja, Korean - kr, Latvian - la, Lithuanian - lt, Macedonian - mk, Dutch - nl, Polish - pl, Portuguese - pt, Romanian - ro, Russian - ru, Swedish - se, Slovak - sk, Slovenian - sl, Spanish - es, Turkish - tr, Ukrainian - ua, Vietnamese - vi, Chinese Simplified - zh_cn, Chinese Traditional - zh_tw.

parameters.name: cnt
parameters.description: amount of days in the future to forecast

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: city name and country code divided by comma, use ISO 3166 country codes

get.description: 16 day forecasts is available at any location or city. Forecasts include daily weather and available in JSON or XML format. It is only available for all paid accounts.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: You can use lang parameter to get the output in your language. We support the following languages that you can use with the corresponded lang values: Arabic - ar, Bulgarian - bg, Catalan - ca, Czech - cz, German - de, Greek - el, English - en, Persian (Farsi) - fa, Finnish - fi, French - fr, Galician - gl, Croatian - hr, Hungarian - hu, Italian - it, Japanese - ja, Korean - kr, Latvian - la, Lithuanian - lt, Macedonian - mk, Dutch - nl, Polish - pl, Portuguese - pt, Romanian - ro, Russian - ru, Swedish - se, Slovak - sk, Slovenian - sl, Spanish - es, Turkish - tr, Ukrainian - ua, Vietnamese - vi, Chinese Simplified - zh_cn, Chinese Traditional - zh_tw.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Standard, metric, and imperial units are available.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: longitude (used with lat)

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: use 'xml' for xml output

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: {city name}, {country code} - city name and country code divided by comma, use ISO 3166 country codes

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: {zip code},{country code}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id city ID

parameters.name: cnt
parameters.description: To limit number of listed cities please setup 'cnt' parameter that specifies the number of lines returned.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitude (used with lon)

get.description: 5 day forecast is available at any location or city. It includes weather data every 3 hours. Forecast is available in JSON or XML format.

Climate forecast for 30 days allows you to request weather data for the next 30 days. This product is based on a statistical approach to our Historical weather data and is updated with 1-hour frequency.
